tool_description: Filters prospect lists based on geographic territories and sales region assignments to ensure proper lead distribution and coverage.

prospect_list.description: List of prospect identifiers to filter

territory_definitions.description: Territory definitions (countries, states, cities, or zip codes)

error_messages: Empty prospect list: At least one prospect must be provided
Invalid territory definitions: Territory definitions must be provided
Invalid filter mode: Use include_only, exclude, or priority_order
Geographic data unavailable: Location data not available for some prospects
Territory overlap: Some territories overlap and need clarification
usage: Provide a list of prospects and define the geographic territories. Choose whether to include only prospects in territories, exclude them, or prioritize by territory order.

territory_assignments.description: Territory assignment for each filtered prospect

filtering_summary.description: Summary of filtering results and statistics
